import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses-student', templateUrl: './courses-student.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses-student.component.css'] }) export class CoursesStudentComponent { myCourses = [ { title: 'SMM Expert', nextLesson: 'Next Lesson: 08.07.2024', completion: 86, image: 'smm-expert.png' }, { title: 'Web Design Basic', nextLesson: 'Next Lesson: 06.07.2024', completion: 50, image: 'web-design-basic.png' }, { title: 'Motion Design', nextLesson: 'Course Passed', completion: 100, image: 'motion-design.png' }, { title: 'Photoshop', nextLesson: 'Course Passed', completion: 100, image: 'photoshop.png' }, ]; recommendedCourses = [ { title: 'UI/UX Design Pro', nextLesson: '32 Lessons', completion: 0, image: 'ui-ux-design-pro.png' }, { title: 'SMM Pro', nextLesson: '23 Lessons', completion: 0, image: 'smm-pro.png' }, { title: 'Motion Design Pro', nextLesson: '16 Lessons', completion: 0, image: 'motion-design-pro.png' }, ]; }
